instructions.name: Add
instructions.description: Adds two arguments [D,S] storing the result in the (D)estination register.

instructions.name: Move
instructions.description: Moves the value of the (S)ource register to the (D)estination register.

instructions.name: Pop
instructions.description: Pops the top value from the stack into the (D)estination register.

instructions.name: Push
instructions.description: Pushes the value of the (S)ource register onto the stack.

instructions.name: Subtract
instructions.description: Subtracts the value of the (S)ource register from the (D)estination register storing the result in the (D)estination register.
